subject: Photography
title: Color as Composition Tool
description: One-minute skill: Color as Composition Tool.

hook.text: Forget leading lines. A single red object in a field of green will grab the eye before anything else.

buildup.text: Color contrast directs the viewer's eye. Warm colors advance visually, cool colors recede into the background.

discovery.text: A bright yellow taxi in a gray city street becomes the focal point. Color isolates subjects without cropping.

twist.text: Too many competing colors scatter attention. The most powerful compositions use a limited, intentional palette.

climax.text: Color is invisible composition. It guides the eye just like lines and shapes ‚Äî but most viewers never notice.

punchline.text: The eye follows color before it follows form.

quiz.question: How does color function as a compositional tool?
options: Warm colors advance and cool colors recede, directing the viewer's eye
Color has no effect on composition
